hotels.title: USA: Artistic Bentonville City Escape with Onsite Art Gallery, Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Right in the heart of Bentonville's charming town square, 21c Museum Hotel is more than just a place to crash. Part boutique hotel, part contemporary art gallery, it features 104 well-appointed rooms and a quirky Green Penguin mascot keeping watch. The Hive, the hotel's signature restaurant, is where culture, comfort and creativity collide. Arkansas didn't earn \"The Natural State\" nickname for nothing, and this hotel puts you in the sweet spot to soak it all in. Whether you're a trail-blazing outdoor enthusiast or a culture vulture hunting for your next artistic fix, Bentonville delivers. 21c is your playful, polished launchpad to explore the local art scene, hit the trails and eat your way through town.
